languages.text: "Ну а моя стая даже среди братьев по роте числится самыми ретивыми охотниками до славы. Когда были мы юнцами, то не ведали запретов и предела гордости. Годы минули, все мы уже — ветераны, но нас не оставила алчная жажда подвига". {n}От слов великана веет теплом, словно от жарко натопленного очага в зимнюю ночь.{/n}

"Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну а моя стая даже среди братьев по роте числится самыми ретивыми охотниками до славы. Когда были мы юнцами, то не ведали запретов и предела гордости. Годы минули, все мы уже — ветераны, но нас не оставила алчная жажда подвига". {n}От слов великана веет теплом, словно от жарко натопленного очага в зимнюю ночь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

"Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

"Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

"Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

languages.text: “即便是在我的兄弟们之中，我的狼群也称得上是最为渴求荣耀的猎手。年轻的时候，我们的骄傲漫无止境，做事也百无禁忌。这么多年过去了，我们尽管变成了老兵，但我们对功绩与荣耀的渴望丝毫不减。”{n}这头巨狼的话语中似乎散发着热量，仿佛冬夜中的熊熊烈火。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “即便是在屠龙巨狼连队中，我的狼群也称得上是最为渴求荣耀的猎手。年轻的时候，我们的骄傲漫无止境，做事也百无禁忌。这么多年过去了，我们尽管变成了老兵，但我们对功绩与荣耀的渴望丝毫不减。”{n}这头巨狼的话语中似乎散发着热量，仿佛冬夜中的熊熊烈火。{/n}

languages.text: «Incluso entre nuestros hermanos mi jauría es el grupo con más ansias de gloria. Cuando éramos jóvenes, no había tabúes que respetáramos ni límites a nuestro orgullo. Y aunque con los años nos hemos vuelto veteranos, nuestra sed de hazañas se conserva». {n}Las palabras del enorme Lobo Espacial desprenden calor como la hoguera de un campamento en invierno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Incluso entre los Matadragones mi jauría es el grupo con más ansias de gloria. Cuando éramos jóvenes, no había tabúes que respetáramos ni límites a nuestro orgullo. Y aunque con los años nos hemos vuelto veteranos, nuestra sed de hazañas se conserva». {n}Las palabras del enorme Lobo Espacial desprenden calor como la hoguera de un campamento en invierno.{/n}

languages.text: 「兄弟の中でも、俺の群れは最も熱狂的な栄光ある狩人として数えられている。俺たちが若かった頃、タブーもプライドの限界も知らなかった。年月が経ち、突然古参にはなったが、功績への貪欲な渇望は衰えていない」{n}巨大なスペースウルフの言葉は、冬の夜に燃え盛る炎のように熱を放っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「竜屠りの中でも、俺の群れは最も熱狂的な栄光ある狩人として数えられている。俺たちが若かった頃、タブーもプライドの限界も知らなかった。年月が経ち、突然古参にはなったが、功績への貪欲な渇望は衰えていない」{n}巨大なスペースウルフの言葉は、冬の夜に燃え盛る炎のように熱を放っている。{/n}

languages.text: "Selbst unter den Brüdern gelten die Mitglieder meines Rudels als fanatischste Jäger nach Ruhm. Als wir jung waren, kannten wir keine Tabus, unser Stolz kannte keine Grenzen. Die Jahre strichen ins Land und plötzlich sind wir Veteranen, doch unser gieriger Hunger nach Siegen ist stark wie eh und je." {n}Die Worte des riesigen Space Wolfs scheinen Hitze auszustrahlen, wie von einem lodernden Feuer in einer Winternacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Selbst unter den Slayers gelten die Mitglieder meines Rudels als fanatischste Jäger nach Ruhm. Als wir jung waren, kannten wir keine Tabus, unser Stolz kannte keine Grenzen. Die Jahre strichen ins Land und plötzlich sind wir Veteranen, doch unser gieriger Hunger nach Siegen ist stark wie eh und je." {n}Die Worte des riesigen Space Wolfs scheinen Hitze auszustrahlen, wie von einem lodernden Feuer in einer Winternacht.{/n}

languages.text: « Même parmi les frères, ma meute est considérée comme la plus enragée et la plus assoiffée de gloire. Quand nous étions jeunes, notre fierté ne connaissait ni limite ni tabou. Les années ont passé, et nous voilà vétérans, mais notre faim insatiable d'exploits est intacte. » {n}Les paroles du gigantesque Space Wolf semblent irradier de chaleur, comme un feu crépitant lors d'une nuit d'hiver.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Même parmi les Drakeslayers, ma meute est considérée comme la plus enragée et la plus assoiffée de gloire. Quand nous étions jeunes, notre fierté ne connaissait aucune limite ni aucun tabou. Les années ont passé, et nous voilà vétérans, mais notre faim insatiable d'exploits est intacte. » {n}Les paroles du gigantesque Space Wolf semblent irradier de chaleur, comme un feu crépitant lors d'une nuit d'hiver.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

languages.text: "Kardeşler arasında bile benim sürüm, en azgın şan avcıları olarak görülür. Biz gençken hiçbir yasağı dinlemez, gururumuzun sınırlarını zorlardık. Yıllar geçerken aniden gazi olduk ama yiğitliğe duyduğumuz açlık hâlâ dinmiş değil." {n}Devasa Uzay Kurdu'nun sözleri, bir kış gecesi gürleyen ateş gibi içini yakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Even among the brothers, my pack are counted as the most rabid glory hunters. When we were young, we knew no taboos or limits to our pride. Years passed, and suddenly we are veterans, but our avaricious hunger for exploits is undimmed." {n}The giant Space Wolf's words seem to radiate heat, as from a roaring fire on a winter's night.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerin arasında bile benim sürüm, en azgın şan avcıları olarak görülür. Biz gençken hiçbir yasağı dinlemez, gururumuzun sınırlarını zorlardık. Yıllar geçerken aniden gazi olduk ama yiğitliğe duyduğumuz açlık hâlâ dinmedi." {n}Devasa Uzay Kurdu'nun sözleri, bir kış gecesi gürleyen ateş gibi içini yakıyor.{/n}
